title: Wrist band

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for a wrist band, as shown.

description: FIG. 1 is a front elevation of a wrist band showing my new design with the ends of the wrist band joined;
FIG. 2 is a right side elevation thereof, the left side being a mirror image;
FIG. 3 is a rear elevation thereof;
FIG. 4 is a top plan view thereof; and,
FIG. 5 is a bottom perspective view showing the wrist band with the ends of the wrist band disconnected.
The face, ears and tail shown in broken lines in FIGS. 1–5 denote the nature and environmental use of the design and are not part of the design.
